body.name: JUNHEDAMAI 14 Inch Queen Size Bed Frame, Heavy Duty Metal Platform Bed Frame Queen Size with Fixed Buckle, Storage Space Under Frame, No Screws Required, No Box Spring Needed, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 7 hrs 32 mins
features: Upgraded Design&Easy Installation-Enjoy a seamless assembly process without the need for screws or tools—a purely manual setup for swift installation. Each package includes four fixed buckle, it accommodates most queen bed styles, preventing mattress slippage.

Robust Construction-Crafted meticulously from premium-grade, high-strength steel, our queen bed frame ensures a serene and secure sleep experience. Capable of holding up to 1600lbs, it guarantees stability without any disturbances, offering you the tranquil rest you deserve on a queen platform bed frame.

Clever Storage Solutions-Revel in the ample under-bed storage, accommodating items up to 12.6 inches high. This platform bed frame optimizes space efficiency, allowing you to neatly tuck essentials beneath your queen bed, enhancing functionality without compromising style.

Streamlined Design-Redefining space utilization, our minimalist design eliminates the requirement for a box spring, cutting costs and maximizing space. Experience a noise-free environment while extending the lifespan of your mattress on this metal bed frame queen size.

Aesthetic Appeal-Adaptable and aesthetically pleasing, our queen bed frame effortlessly complements various settings, from bedrooms to guest rooms, rentals, dorms, and apartments. Its stylish design seamlessly merges with any ambiance, enhancing the overall aesthetic appeal of your queen bedframe.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Quick Installation The assembly of a metal bed frame can be easily completed without the need for screws or tools. Anti-slip Rubber Feet Anti-slip feet silently protect floors during installation Mattress Fixed Buckle The mattress stays in place with the help of fixtures. U-Shaped Groove Fixed slats, not easy to slide Next page 1 Quick Installation 2 Anti-slip Rubber Feet 3 Mattress Fixed Buckle 4 U-Shaped Groove

Does this bed frame require a box spring ? You can put the mattress directly on the bed frame without the need for a box spring. Do you need tools for bed frame installation? No, no tools or screws are needed to install our bed frames, one person can assemble them quickly! What type of mattress does this metal bed frame support? Our bed frame are designed to do it all! Placing your memory foam, latex, or spring mattress on top can aid in your comfortable sleeping. What is the distance between slats? For Twin and Full sizes, spacing is 4.86 inches. For Queen and King sizes, spacing is 5.14 inches. What is the policy regarding returns? We offer Amazon logistics distribution and enjoy the return policy for Amazon logistics products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This frame is pretty great. It was fairly easy to assemble, and put together in less than an hour. It’s great for height for the twelve inch mattress that we have with it, and it offers amazing storage underneath. I have all my shoes and other totes that fit perfectly sliding underneath. We have had ours for four or so months now, and I will say that you are going to want to retighten the fasteners after a while. My husband and I are both over 300 pounds, so it’s definitely sturdy to hold us and our big dog. Great for the price point especially.3633

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m going to start off with I’m 7 months pregnant so this was a bigger issue. With that being said the leg is bowed in the the support bars don’t fit all the way across and it caused it to collapse it claims to hold 3000 pounds not that we needed that with us and our mattress and 2 dogs. But my 100 pound dog jumped from the floor to the bed which caused all the support bars to come off sending me tumbling. Not a fun moment for anyone I’m sure but at 7 months pregnant it’s very scary. If you look at the picture I had to leave the bars that far off one side to even reach the middle bracket the bed frame was easy to assemble and tbh if the bars was a little longer it would be almost perfect as a frame unfortunately my only options is return and wait on a refund or replace with the exact same product then return meaning I would be left with a mattress on the floor again trying to get up at 7 months pregnant

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The frame was what I needed. It was easy to assemble. The 4 stars were given because the item missing was the most important and that was the brackets that holds the mattress in place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Strong and easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: The frame is really strong and sturdy.. easy to assemble .. good quality for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Make sure you check size
reviews.reviewText: I gotta say I'm a bit disappointed, the frame looks great and works great. However, I ordered a queen pair for a queen too I only have a queen mattress, I received however a king size. Initially I thought maybe it's adjustable, but the instructions simply said full, queen, King. Which, is not a size. There's no one size fits all for a mattress especially with a frame such as this without tripping on your way out of bed and possibly breaking a leg. Sadly I never used it I barely received it today and had to take it back apart because it's a King size and absolutely does not fit my bed without massive amounts of bar overhang creating a hazard. Also the parts we numbered incorrectly as well so thankfully there are photos you can use to make sure you connect the correct parts together. Another thing I noticed is some of the main bars are cut just a touch too small to fit snug against the brackets that connect so you'll definitely have to make sure your fitting it edge to edge not fit snug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sturdy frame and easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together, very sturdy frame. Does not make any noise with my bed in top. Great space underneath to fit some storage bins. All parts included and my 12 year old kid was able to assemble it. I am very pleased. Would definitely buy again. Thanks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This bed is sturdy at 10/10 easy to put together! Some areas I had to squeeze the bars in but I mean that's given with metal frames they don't all fit absolutely perfectly but with a slight nudge it was fins! No screwing or tools needed so easy.

reviews.reviewText: Item was not properly assembled before distributing for sale. Item mounting doesn’t correspond with assembly in no shape, way or form. Very displeased!
